Html:
In the home page of clubstarterkit v3 preview we can see 5 records but what if we want to make it more or less.  
I have gone through all these projects code: ClubStarterKit.Core , ClubStarterKit.Infrastructure, ClubStarterKit.Data.NHibernate,  ClubStarterKit.Domain, ClubStarterKit.Tests, ClubStarterKit.Web and commented almost all the code but with no change.

Where queries code are located OR are the setting located in UI? I have tried all but no success?

 

Akbar
